text:
June 7, 1956
% dear Keith!
Sorry I didn*t know about this sooner.
Forgive this haste, but an getting ready to leave for a European trip next Tuesday.
I will follow through with Stanton Smith, who is the President of the Tennessee
State Federation of Labor, and a very decent person. I have already been in touch 1
with him about your operations, and I know that he wants to help.
Sincerely, \
M* S. Novik
Hr. Keith J. Nighbert
Program Director
Station WKNO-TV
268 Jefferson Ave.
Msmphis 3, Tenn.
MSNiau Enel,
